activities: ExterNetworks processes candidate, employee, consultant and contractor information and provides human capital management automation services for its customers and their suppliers. These activities often include applicant tracking, budget analysis, performance reporting, payroll and benefits administration, recordkeeping, and security and network access. ExterNetworks also receives personal information of its own internal employees in the EU for similar human resources and network access purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Germany, Italy, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-Line, Off-Line, Manually Processed, Human Resources
recoursemech: ExterNetworks agrees to cooperate with EU Data Protection Authorities
